projectGridLines.title: Project detials given in Description
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Building an ML based propensity model to increase conversion from SL to HL, HL to AL

& AL To DL

Description: Developing an ML model to convert existing rule-based model to machine

learning models. These propensity scores at different stages could help in prioritizing the

correct leads which in turn would increase conversion & reduce TAT. Use EDA and ML

techniques on various parameters/attributes to improve the msme loan lending business

Skill sets: SQL, Python/R, Excel, Bash, MS Office

Traits expectation: proactive, adaptable, collaborative, curiosity, open-mindedness and

willingness to take risks.

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution: Machine learning, Predictive modeling - Good

to have, Python

Project 2 Title: Leveraging external data sources & Building real time data pipelines

Description: Integrating various external data sources to enhance the data ecosystem and

enable advanced analytics. You'll work on designing and developing real-time data pipelines,

ensuring seamless data flow between external APIs, databases, and our internal systems. The

role will involve handling data ingestion, transformation, and storage in a scalable manner

while optimizing for performance. you'll gain hands-on experience with modern data

engineering tools and technologies, contributing to the creation of a robust data infrastructure

that powers real-time insights and decision-making.

Skill sets: SQL, Python, Excel, Bash, MS Office, AWS Basic Modules, PySpark, Kafka

Traits expectation: proactive, adaptable, collaborative, curiosity, open-mindedness and

willingness to take risks.

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution: Data Engineering, Python

Project 3 Title: Gen AI - LLM based model development & Insights Generation

Description: Developing and fine-tuning of LLMs to harness the power of GenAI for business

applications. Working on building models that can understand and generate human-like

responses, with a specific emphasis on creating solutions that provide prompt-based

responses and generate actionable insights. It involves end-to-end processes, including data

acquisition, model training, fine-tuning, and deploying models in real-world scenarios.

Additionally, you'll explore methods to extract valuable insights from unstructured data,

enabling data-driven decision-making.

The project aims to create AI models that are not only capable of understanding complex

queries but can also offer deep analytics, helping to enhance operational efficiency and

customer engagement.

Skill sets: SQL, Python, Excel, LLM (GPT, BERT or other transformer model)

Traits expectation: proactive, adaptable, collaborative, curiosity, open-mindedness and

willingness to take risks.

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution: Hugging Face - Transformers
